Natural language text: In practice, the javax.xml.xpath.XPathFactory.newInstance() method is often preferable to javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance() for creating and configuring a new instance of an XPath factory.
API Non-FQNs: None

Natural language text: HttpServletResponse.setContentType() sets the content type of the response being sent to the client, which is crucial for web applications (available since Servlet 2.4).
API Non-FQNs: HttpServletResponse.setContentType(); Servlet

Natural language text: The doFilter() method must return void, so you couldn't directly return a value like you were planning to anyway.
API Non-FQNs: doFilter()
